scripts.phonegap-wp8: npm run setup && phonegap --verbose build wp8 && npm run config-wp8
scripts.phonegap-wp8-test: npm run setup && phonegap --verbose build wp8 --test
scripts.release-android: npm run setup && phonegap build android --verbose --release --buildConfig=./resources/signing/android/build-config.json
scripts.release-ad-hoc-android: npm run setup && phonegap build android --verbose --release --buildConfig=./resources/signing/android/ad-hoc/build-config.json
scripts.release-ios: npm run setup && phonegap build ios --verbose --device --release --buildConfig=./resources/signing/ios/build-config.json
scripts.release-wp8: npm run -- phonegap-wp8 && phonegap compile wp8 --release --verbose
scripts.setup: npm run clean && npm run setup-directories
